description: Police found David Dickinson smoking cannabis at a gathering on Spaldrick Beach.
title: Coronavirus: Beach partygoer jailed for breaching lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Beach partygoer jailed for breaching lockdown - BBC News
maintext: The court heard Dickinson claimed he used the drug to ease chronic hip and back pain he suffered as the result of clubfoot, which caused him to walk with a limp.
